about_the_game:
Demo Version

This is a demo version of the game, offering a small slice of the game's environment. In this demo, players can explore a limited area of the space station to experience the game's atmosphere, controls, and mechanics.

The space station Avalon has been invaded and lost its main power, plunging it into darkness with only the infinite cold of space surrounding it. Your mission is to escape alive by utilizing teamwork, restoring power to the ship's sections, and collecting aliens’ DNA samples.

Players team up online to navigate the darkness of the space station. Players can find and carry only one item at a time to fend off invaders, clear paths, and open gates. Success hinges on effective communication and collective problem-solving.


  • Players must navigate the station, restore power to its sections to unlock doors, find essential items, collect aliens' DNA samples, and solve puzzles to reach the rescue capsule.


  • Overcome the dark, resource scarcity, and relentless alien predators while managing fear and maintaining team cohesion.


  • Each session provides a different layout and enemy patterns, ensuring a fresh and challenging experience every time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: A cooperative sci-fi horror adventure where players must work together to find a rescue capsule on a space station under alien invasion.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
